headline: Will Apollo’s AI Data Center and Logistics Credit Push Change Apollo Global Management's (APO) Narrative
summary: In January, Apollo Global Management’s funds and affiliates led a US$3.50 billion capital solution for Valor Compute Infrastructure to finance a US$5.40 billion acquisition and lease of advanced AI data center hardware, including NVIDIA GPUs, for an xAI subsidiary, while also arranging about €900 million in senior secured financing for a pan‑European logistics portfolio. The deals underscore Apollo’s push into AI infrastructure and real estate credit, areas that contributed to record...

headline: January jobs data, Alphabet and Amazon earnings, more Warsh fallout: What to watch this week
summary: Crucial labor market data, more earnings from Big Tech giants, and continued discussion over where Kevin Warsh may lead the central bank should set the agenda in the week ahead.
